refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates a tone related to a brass instrument.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Audio output is a tone related to a brass instrument, using a physical model developed from Perry Cook, but re-coded for Csound.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares wgbrass kamp, kfreq, ktens, iatt, kvibf, kvamp \ [, ifn] [, iminfreq]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iatt -- time taken to reach full pressure
ifn -- optional table of shape of vibrato, defaults to a sine table.
iminfreq -- lowest frequency at which the instrument will play. If it is omitted it is taken to be the same as the initial kfreq. If iminfreq is negative, initialization will be skipped.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: A note is played on a brass-like instrument, with the arguments as below.
ktens -- lip tension of the player. Suggested value is about 0.4
kvibf -- frequency of vibrato in Hertz. Suggested range is 0 to 12

warning.title: NOTE
warning.para: This is rather poor, and at present uncontrolled. Needs revision, and possibly more parameters.
